function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Education and awareness campaigns to debunk miasma theory and promote understanding of the true causes of contagious distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in water treatment facilities, improving sanitation infrastructure, and promoting access to clean water in urban areas.","category":"Managing groups.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement and enforce robust containment and spatial distancing strategies, invest in public health infrastructure and monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement effective drainage and water management systems to reduce mosquito breeding sites","category":"Environmental parameters planning, and ensuring diverse stakeholder engagement in spatial interventions.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing public health measures, promoting vaccination, and enhancing sanitation and hygiene practices in urban settings.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in modern public health infrastructure","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing strict health and safety measures, reducing workforce density, and promoting remote work where possible","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Providing appropriate personal protective equipment ppe , implementing strict hygiene protocols, and conducting regular testing","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement control measures based on risk levels, conduct risk management programs, and prioritize the use of engineering controls, administrative controls, and ppe","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement preventive efforts to minimize the probability of exposure, apply administrative controls and ppe, and conduct regular monitoring of controls","category":"Ensure use of personal protection measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing ventilation control measures and enhancing hvac systems","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving ventilation efficiency and increasing air exchanges","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring of ventilation systems, maintenance of air filters, and ensuring continuous operation of ventilation systems.","category":"Maintenace / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing high-efficiency particulate air hepa filters, periodic cleaning and disinfection of ventilation systems, and avoiding air recirculation in areas with high occupancy.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoid central recirculation and use 100% outdoor fresh air in industries with ventilation systems during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict closure of recirculation dampers and use high efficiency filters in recirculation units.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Turn off induction units and fan coils with local circulation to prevent resuspension of virus particles.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maximize outdoor airflow and consider the use of ultraviolet irradiation to reactivate the virus in recirculation air.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ventilation by opening windows, using outdoor air dampers, and adjusting thermostat settings","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforce larger social distance among workers to improve ventilation cleaning effects","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of high-efficiency air filters to effectively filter out particles and reduce the airborne transmission of viruses","category":"Air cleaners with hepa filters","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Installing physical barriers to maintain distance and limit droplet transmission","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of barriers, proper installation based on ventilation requirements, and appropriate material selection.","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proper training on ppe use and maintenance, regular supply of high-quality ppe, and enforcement of usage protocols.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"}]}
